items.title: WATCH:  Drone owner helps save dog from frozen lake
items.description: Kishan Patel stepped into action, helping police in Parsippany, New Jersey, rescue a 20-month-old sheepadoodle from a snow-covered frozen lake.

items.title: In states that ban abortion, social safety net programs often fail families
items.description: Tennessee has nearly total abortion ban and a porous safety net for mothers and young children

items.title: Trump again suggests US should own and control Greenland
items.description: President-elect Donald Trump is again floating his interest in U.S. ownership of Greenland.
